segments.text: Can you vouch for me that I was with you yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do I need to do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My character is in question . Someone was robbed at work and unless I have an alibi , I'm a suspect .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my goodness . Who do I need to talk to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My employer . Can you come in to the office tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Absolutely . I think I still have the boarding passes from our flight here somewhere .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be the real proof . Didn't we have to show ID to get on the plane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since 911 I think every airline requires that the passengers show ID to board .
segments.speaker: S2
